docs.snippet: A POSITION of commercial and political importance among the nations of the world and a population not far short of one hundred and fifty millions before the close of the century -- these are the possibilities along the lines of progress that South...
docs.lead_paragraph: A POSITION of commercial and political importance among the nations of the world and a population not far short of one hundred and fifty millions before the close of the century -- these are the possibilities along the lines of progress that South America is pursuing to-day, according to that keen observer of international affairs, Ambassador James Bryce.

headline.main: JAMES BRYCE PROPHESIES A GREAT SOUTH AMERICA; " It Has Now Begun to Affect the Commercial and Financial Movements of the World," Says the British Ambassador, "and May Before Long Begin to Affect Its Movements in Other Ways Also."

docs.snippet: More than 400 prominent business men who represented the Governments and principal commercial bodies of fifty-five foreign countries at the Fifth International Congress of Chambers of Commerce and industrial associations, held three weeks ago in...
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 400 prominent business men who represented the Governments and principal commercial bodies of fifty-five foreign countries at the Fifth International Congress of Chambers of Commerce and industrial associations, held three weeks ago in Boston, will be the guests of New York City during Thursday, Friday, and Saturday.

headline.main: BUSINESS MEN HOSTS OF FOREIGN VISITORS; They Will Provide Three Days of Pleasure for Delegates to the Commerce Congress.
OTHER ASSASSINS AND THEIR VICTIMS; Republican Executives Have Suffered as Well as Crowned Heads.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 19. -- Senator Elihu Root of New York has been chosen Honorary President of the recently organized American Institute of International Law, formed for the purpose of promoting friendly relations among the Latin-American nations....
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 19. -- Senator Elihu Root of New York has been chosen Honorary President of the recently organized American Institute of International Law, formed for the purpose of promoting friendly relations among the Latin-American nations. Senator Root, in accepting the honor, declared himself heartily in accord with the aims of the institute.
docs.abstract: Sen E Root apptd hon pres of Amer Inst of Intnatl Law to promote friendly relations among Latin Amer nations

headline.main: ROOT HEADS LATIN LAW BODY; Charter Members Named for Institute Aiming at Latin-American Amity.

keywords.value: AMERICAN NATIONS AND WESTERN HEMISPHERE POSSESSIONS

docs.snippet: The Board of United States General Appraisers yesterday sustained a protest by Hermann Boker  Co. against a duty on safety razor blades of 12 cents apiece and 35 per cent. ad valorem, assessed under Paragraph 132, Tariff act of 1909. The importers...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Board of United States General Appraisers yesterday sustained a protest by Hermann Boker Co. against a duty on safety razor blades of 12 cents apiece and 35 per cent. ad valorem, assessed under Paragraph 132, Tariff act of 1909. The importers held this excessive and disproportionate to the value of the goods, and Judge Fischer allowed re-entry at 45 per cent. ad valorem, as manufactures of metal.
docs.abstract: Internatl Stamp Collectors Exhibit, London, awards prizes to 6 Amers

headline.main: LATEST CUSTOMS RULINGS.; Safety Razor Blades Get Lower Rate, but Other Protests Fail.

docs.snippet: Reports from the fancy goods and notions trade vary considerably as to present business conditions. In some quarters, local business is said to be very quiet, while other dealers say these orders are exceptionally good and that the only difficulty...
docs.lead_paragraph: Reports from the fancy goods and notions trade vary considerably as to present business conditions. In some quarters, local business is said to be very quiet, while other dealers say these orders are exceptionally good and that the only difficulty experienced is that of getting goods to deliver at once.

headline.main: FANCY GOODS AND NOTIONS.; Despite Conflicting Reports, the Local Trade Seems Busy -- Prices Up.

docs.snippet: The turn of men's fashions toward cut silk neckwear after a considerable period of more or lees inactivity is proving gratifying to makers of tie silks, according to E.J. Ross of the E.J. Ross Manufacturing Company.
docs.lead_paragraph: The turn of men's fashions toward cut silk neckwear after a considerable period of more or lees inactivity is proving gratifying to makers of tie silks, according to E.J. Ross of the E.J. Ross Manufacturing Company.

headline.main: TIE SILKMAKERS HAPPY.; Increased Call for Cut Silk Neckwear Helping Them.
